rooms.description: Conveniently situated in the Ramna part of Dhaka, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous Shahjalal International Airport. Rated with 5 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to massage, restaurant and hot tub on-site.

Conveniently situated in the Ramna part of Dhaka, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous Shahjalal International Airport. Rated with 5 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to massage, restaurant and hot tub on-site.
Big range of selection for breakfast, Airport pickup and drop-off, it had cinema in the hotel, hotel room was spacious and keep try the chicken sizzler from the restaurant

Great place to stay in Gulshan at a very affordable price, the owner is very arranging, i came very late at night and he managed to find me a comfortable room, far from the busy street. Great location also, not far from the airport, definitely 100% recommended !
